programme.title: Улицы разбитых фонарей
programme.desc: Каждый новый день — новое преступление. За каждым углом поджидает опасность. Главный козырь бандитов в бескомпромиссной криминальной бойне — страх обывателей. Единственные, кто может бросить вызов преступникам — лишенные страха менты. Безупречная четверка вновь оказывается на грани. Каждый новый день — новый бой против бандитов.

programme.title: Улицы разбитых фонарей
programme.desc: Каждый новый день — новое преступление. За каждым углом поджидает опасность. Главный козырь бандитов в бескомпромиссной криминальной бойне — страх обывателей. programme.title: Папа попал
programme.desc: Готовить, убираться, стирать, воспитывать детей… Считаете, что это сугубо женские дела? В шоу "Папа попал" (Хата на тата) мужчины с готовностью будут перекладывать на себя эти обязанности, в то время как их вторые половинки преспокойно уедут в отпуск. А все ради внушительного денежного приза, который достанется папе, если он сумеет достойно справиться со всеми ежедневными "мамиными" делами. Чем обернется этот занятный психологический эксперимент? И сможет ли глава семьи, оставшись совсем один "на хозяйстве", справиться одновременно с работой, домом и детьми?

programme.title: Интерны
programme.desc: Главные герои ситкома — интерны. Они все время попадают в идиотские ситуации, а их руководитель доктор Быков с удовольствием за этим наблюдает.

programme.title: Интерны
programme.desc: Главные герои ситкома — интерны. Они все время попадают в идиотские ситуации, а их руководитель доктор Быков с удовольствием за этим наблюдает.

programme.title: 100 в 1
programme.desc: Проект "100 в 1" покажет, способны ли сто человек выжить на ста квадратных метрах общественной жилой площади. С собой им можно будет взять совсем немного вещей, все остальное будет предложено "приобрести" за деньги из призового фонда. При том, цены будут очень кусающимися – один только звонок родным обойдется им в минус пять тысяч из общего бюджета. Еженедельно герои шоу будут выбирать лидера, который будет решать, какие участники должны покинуть проект. Увеличить же сумму конечного приза можно будет, выполняя различные задания. После 42 дней совместного существования, останется один победитель, который и заберет себе все оставшееся от трех миллионов гривен (110 тыс. евро) – начальной суммы призового фонда.

programme.title: Прощай, любимая
programme.desc: В одном из московских парков находят труп 40-летней женщины. По мнению следствия, ее смерть наступила по естественным причинам, поэтому уголовное дело не заводится. Однако муж погибшей, банковский аналитик и бывший математик Сотников, уверен: его жену убили. Отчаявшись найти поддержку у органов, он начинает собственное расследование. Не имея никакого отношения ни к медицине, ни к юриспруденции, но обладая блестящим математическим умом, Сотников становится профи в новом для себя деле. А вскоре делает два вывода. Первый – его жену, действительно, убили. Второй – у неё был любовник.

programme.title: Прощай, любимая
programme.desc: В одном из московских парков находят труп 40-летней женщины. По мнению следствия, ее смерть наступила по естественным причинам, поэтому уголовное дело не заводится. programme.title: Орел и Решка: На краю света 8
programme.desc: Регина и Коля отправляются в путешествие в самые удаленные уголки Земли. Красота девственной природы, горные реки, головокружительные водопады, высокое звездное небо, древние обычаи и легенды. Сказочные и труднодоступные края карты мира. И, кажется, что здесь-то уж точно не имеет значения, беден ты или богат… Но по-прежнему одному в полное распоряжение дается золотая безлимитная кредитная карточка. Другой получает 100 долларов, на которые и нужно прожить два дня. Решит монетка!

programme.title: Уральские пельмени
programme.desc: Выходцы из клуба весёлых и находчивых "Уральские пельмени" уже давно являются любимцами публики. Зрителями была тепло принята и полюбилась их манера выступления, искромётные шутки на злобу дня и совершенно непревзойдённая харизма команды из Екатеринбурга. Замечательные шоумены регулярно балуют своих поклонников непревзойдёнными номерами. Жанр выступлений "УП" довольно сложно определить, поскольку для них характерны и юмористические этюды, проникновенные зарисовки, не обходятся выступления и без замечательных музыкальных номеров.

programme.title: Чемпионат Европы по футболу 2020. Венгрия - Португалия
programme.desc: Главное соревнование национальных сборных, проводимое под руководством УЕФА. Соревнование проводится каждые 4 года, начиная с 1960 года, и проходит между чемпионатами мира. Первоначально турнир назывался Кубок европейских наций, а в 1968 году название сменили на чемпионат Европы по футболу, и турнир получил официальный статус.

programme.title: Наша Russia
programme.desc: Суровые мужчины и не менее суровые женщины в исполнении Михаила Галустяна и Сергея Светлакова "бичуют и песочат" абсурдность российской жизни в скетч-шоу "Наша Russia" . Не секрет, что некоторые имена этого популярного скетчкома стали нарицательными, а многие шутки разошлись на цитаты. Да что скрывать, подчас мы узнаем себя в персонажах "Наша Russia"! Гей-фрезеровщик Иван Дулин и его начальник Михалыч, таджикские гастарбайтеры Равшан и Джамшуд, депутаты Мамонов и Пронин, четкие пацаны из Краснодара Славик и Димон, учительница-вымогательница Снежана Денисовна, бомжи Сифон и Борода, мужчина, разговаривающий с телевизором, – забавные приключения и нелепые выходки этих и многих других героев популярного юмористического шоу любого рассмешат до слез.

programme.title: Чемпионат Европы по футболу 2020. Франция - Германия
programme.desc: Главное соревнование национальных сборных, проводимое под руководством УЕФА. Соревнование проводится каждые 4 года, начиная с 1960 года, и проходит между чемпионатами мира. Первоначально турнир назывался Кубок европейских наций, а в 1968 году название сменили на чемпионат Европы по футболу, и турнир получил официальный статус.

programme.title: Rizzoli & Isles
programme.desc: Meet an extraordinary pair- Jane Rizzoli, a Boston detective in the Homicide Unit and Dr. Maura Isles, the Commonwealth of Massachusetts' Chief Medical Examiner. They make a great team despite their differences and together with their colleagues, these two women put themselves in dangerous situations on a daily basis, solving various difficult cases, fighting crime and catching killers in this thrilling series inspired by the Maura Isles/Jane Rizzoli series of novels by an author Tess Gerritsen.

programme.title: Rizzoli & Isles
programme.desc: Meet an extraordinary pair- Jane Rizzoli, a Boston detective in the Homicide Unit and Dr. Maura Isles, the Commonwealth of Massachusetts' Chief Medical Examiner. They make a great team despite their differences and together with their colleagues, these two women put themselves in dangerous situations on a daily basis, solving various difficult cases, fighting crime and catching killers in this thrilling series inspired by the Maura Isles/Jane Rizzoli series of novels by an author Tess Gerritsen.

programme.title: Manifest
programme.desc: On an unassuming flight from Jamaica to New York, Montego Air Flight 828 hits a patch of brief, terrifying turbulence. When the 191 passengers and crew members land at New York, they're told five and a half years have passed while they were airborne. Presumed dead by the world, the passengers struggle to come to terms with their existence as relatives and loved ones are not as they were before, and experience uncontrollable hallucinations and premonitions. This thrilling supernatural drama series is full of unexpected twists, as those involved unravel the unsettling mystery behind their presumed deaths.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Criminal Minds shows everyday life of an elite team of special agents who work in the FBI's Behavioral Analysis Unit. They are trained to analyse line of thinking of criminals and foretell their next step and so prevent evil from happening. These specialists come to the rescue when all forces of police are engaged but the criminal is not detected. The agents use their unbelievable psychological methods, make themselves think like a criminal, analyse their characters and personalities.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Criminal Minds shows everyday life of an elite team of special agents who work in the FBI's Behavioral Analysis Unit. These specialists come to the rescue when all forces of police are engaged but the criminal is not detected. The agents use their unbelievable psychological methods, make themselves think like a criminal, analyse their characters and personalities.

programme.title: Burn Notice
programme.desc: Secret Agent Michael Westen has received a "burn notice". He is no longer considered trustworthy and loses his property and his papers. Without money, support or references, he lands in his hometown of Miami. Here he uses his experience as an agent to establish a new private investigator and find out who is responsible for his burn notice.

programme.title: Lincoln Rhyme: Hunt for the Bone Collector
programme.desc: American crime drama starring Russell Hornsby as Lincoln Rhyme; a disabled forensic expert working with the New York Department Police Department. Tetraplegic as a result of a near-fatal accident at a crime scene, Lincoln is a talented and resolute criminologist who continues to work alongside the force despite being retired. When Amelia Sachs, a determined young detective, contacts Lincoln about an infamous serial killer known as Bone Collector; Lincoln assists the team in trying to capture some of the most dangerous criminals around. This series is adapted from the novel The Bone Collector by Jeffery Deaver.

programme.title: Manifest
programme.desc: On an unassuming flight from Jamaica to New York, Montego Air Flight 828 hits a patch of brief, terrifying turbulence. This thrilling supernatural drama series is full of unexpected twists, as those involved unravel the unsettling mystery behind their presumed deaths.

programme.title: Inspector Rex
programme.desc: On the streets of Vienna there's a new Kommissar, Kommissar Rex. After Rex's handler is killed, Richie Moser, newly divorced, finds himself drawn to Rex and breaks him out of the police center. And the new partnership is born. Rex uses his abilities to help track down the criminals and protect the innocent – and prevent his handler from falling in love. After Moser is killed in the line of duty (Season 4 : Ep 4), a reluctant Rex gets another new partner, Alex Brandtner. In Season 8, Marc Hoffmann is now Rex's partner, and he works along side Niki Herzog. Season 11 sees Rex relocated to Rome, Italy and he now has a new partner. Rex: During the series Rex was played by two different dogs.

programme.title: Hot in Cleveland
programme.desc: American sitcom. Melanie, Joy and Victoria are three friends from Los Angeles who find themselves making an unplanned stop in the City of Cleveland. When they discover that life in Ohio is a world away from the LA-existence that they've just left behind in California, these three feisty females decide to stay. Taken with this new-found city, they rent a house from an elderly caretaker named Elka. This comedy series is about getting older, dealing with the past, dating, relationships, dilemmas and friendship. Starring Valerie Bertinelli, Jane Leeves, Wendie Malick and Betty White.

This comedy series is about getting older, dealing with the past, dating, relationships, dilemmas and friendship. Starring Valerie Bertinelli, Jane Leeves, Wendie Malick and Betty White.

programme.title: Dr. Ken
programme.desc: American sitcom starring Ken Jeong. Meet Dr Ken Park – he's a general practitioner with a wonderful wife and two bright kids. Dr Ken might seem to have it all – but what he lacks is tact, humility and consideration for others. The straight-talking Ken jokes his way through his personal and professional life as he tries to balance the two. Also starring Suzy Nakamura, Tisha Campbell and Jonathan Slavin.

programme.title: Kevin Can Wait
programme.desc: Kevin Can Wait is an American comedy series starring Kevin James as Kevin Gable, a police officer who finally retires. He has a whole retirement plan developed, hoping for a carefree life from now on, spent in fun activities with his fellow retired friends. But his family life ruins it all. It turns out that being at home with his wife and three children ain't so easy. His pension paycheck is too small, so he has to continue doing different jobs to support his family. With hypochondriac son Jack, daughter Sara with anger management issues, and eldest daughter Kendra quitting college and wanting to marry, things go a lot different than he imagined.

programme.title: Younger

She says she is 26 and gets a job she has wanted so much. She finds herself in the highly competitive world of publishing and now has to balance her real life and her made up one, with new friends and colleagues. Is it possible for a divorced mother to reinvent her life and manage her career and private life pretending to be someone much younger?

programme.title: The Nanny
programme.desc: Fran Fine, a fashionista and make-up saleswoman, shows up on the doorstep of the Sheffield family and becomes the nanny to Maggie, Brighton, and Grace, the children of British Broadway producer Maxwell Sheffield. The householf is managed by the acerbic butler Niles, who supports Fran, and often visited by Maxwell's business partner C.C. Babcock, who is determined to undermine her, as she sees Maxwell's attraction to Fran but is interested in him herself.

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Captivating American sitcom that follows the lives of Ted Mosby and his friends- a long-lasting couple Marshall Eriksen and Lily Aldrin, womanizer Barney Stinson, and news reporter and Ted's love interest Robin Scherbatsky, who all live in New York City. The story starts in 2030 as Ted tells his children the story of how he meet their mother, and goes back to 2005 when Ted started his quest of finding true love and the ''one'' for him. During his journey, he and his friends will have lots of funny, sad, unexpected and otrageous escapades.

programme.title: Revolver
programme.desc: Guy Ritchie's action thriller, starring Jason Statham, Vincent Pastore and Ray Liotta. Gambler Jake spends seven years behind bars after taking the fall for mean crime boss Dorothy Macha. Upon his release, Jake foolishly takes on Macha in a card game and wins, prompting a hit to be put out on Jake. However, he refuses to go down without a fight and finds protection in an unlikely source. Andre Benjamin, Francesca Annis and Mark Strong also star.

programme.title: Slow TV: Walk
programme.desc: A walk on a beach with the greyhound.

programme.title: What's on Filmzone?
programme.desc: Introducing movies on Filmzone.

programme.title: L.A. Confidential
programme.desc: Neo-noir crime movie revolves around the story of a group of LAPD officers in 1953. Three policemen tackle down to the corruption surrounding an unsolved murder at a downtown Los Angeles coffee shop in an apparently gangster-style shoot-out. Detective Lieutenant Exley, the son of a murdered detective, is determined to avenge his father's death. The ex-partner of Officer White, implicated in a scandal rooted out by Exley, was one of the victims. Sergeant Vincennes feeds classified information to a tabloid magnate. The three are unwillingly drawn into a conspiracy involving police corruption, Hollywood immorality, and prostitution.

programme.title: Under the Silver Lake
programme.desc: Sam, a disenchanted young man, finds a mysterious woman swimming in his apartment's pool one night. The next morning, she disappears. Sam sets off across LA to find her, and along the way he uncovers a conspiracy far more bizarre.

programme.title: I'm Not There
programme.desc: Six incarnations of Bob Dylan: an actor, a folk singer, an electrified troubadour, Rimbaud, Billy the Kid, and Woody Guthrie. Put Dylan's music behind their adventures, soliloquies, interviews, marriage, and infidelity. Recreate 1960s documentaries in black and white. Put each at a crossroads, the artist becoming someone else. Jack, the son of Ramblin' Jack Elliott, finds Jesus; handsome Robbie falls in love then abandons Claire. Woody, a lad escaped from foster care, hobos the U.S. singing; Billy awakes in a valley threatened by a six-lane highway; Rimbaud talks. Jude, booed at Newport when he goes electric, fences with reporters, pundits, and fans. He won't be classified.

However, he refuses to go down without a fight and finds protection in an unlikely source. Andre Benjamin, Francesca Annis and Mark Strong also star.

programme.title: Under the Silver Lake
programme.desc: Sam, a disenchanted young man, finds a mysterious woman swimming in his apartment's pool one night. The next morning, she disappears. Sam sets off across LA to find her, and along the way he uncovers a conspiracy far more bizarre.

programme.title: Unlocked
programme.desc: Alice Racine is an interrogation officer who is forced to live in London after a failed operation during a terrorist attack in Paris. She now works undercover at a community centre in an area known for Islamic extremism. However, the CIA discover that there's a planned biological attack by radical imam Yazid Khaleel. She is called by her mentor back into action, but soon ends up running for her life with the help of a former soldier, as they try to prevent the lethal London attack.

programme.title: Transcendence
programme.desc: A scientist's drive for artificial intelligence, takes on dangerous implications when his consciousness is uploaded into one such program.

programme.title: Fright Night
programme.desc: When a nice new neighbor moves in next door, Charley discovers that he is an ancient vampire who preys on the community. Can he save his neighborhood from the creature with the help of the famous "vampire killer", Peter Vincent?

programme.title: What's on Filmzone Plus?
programme.desc: Introducing movies on Filmzone Plus.

programme.title: Slow TV: Snow
programme.desc: Slow walk in a snowy nordic forest.

programme.title: I'm Not There
programme.desc: Six incarnations of Bob Dylan: an actor, a folk singer, an electrified troubadour, Rimbaud, Billy the Kid, and Woody Guthrie. Put Dylan's music behind their adventures, soliloquies, interviews, marriage, and infidelity. Recreate 1960s documentaries in black and white. Put each at a crossroads, the artist becoming someone else. Jack, the son of Ramblin' Jack Elliott, finds Jesus; handsome Robbie falls in love then abandons Claire. Woody, a lad escaped from foster care, hobos the U.S. singing; Billy awakes in a valley threatened by a six-lane highway; Rimbaud talks. Jude, booed at Newport when he goes electric, fences with reporters, pundits, and fans. He won't be classified.

programme.title: Enough Said
programme.desc: A divorced woman who decides to pursue the man she's interested in learns he's her new friend's ex-husband.

programme.title: L.A. Confidential
programme.desc: Neo-noir crime movie revolves around the story of a group of LAPD officers in 1953. Three policemen tackle down to the corruption surrounding an unsolved murder at a downtown Los Angeles coffee shop in an apparently gangster-style shoot-out. Detective Lieutenant Exley, the son of a murdered detective, is determined to avenge his father's death. The ex-partner of Officer White, implicated in a scandal rooted out by Exley, was one of the victims. Sergeant Vincennes feeds classified information to a tabloid magnate. The three are unwillingly drawn into a conspiracy involving police corruption, Hollywood immorality, and prostitution.

programme.title: Stay
programme.desc: Drama, starring Ewan McGregor and Ryan Gosling. Troubled art student Henry is furious when his usual therapist is replaced by stranger, and announces he will commit suicide at midnight the following Saturday. The new shrink, Sam, who has troubles of his own, races to find a way of helping his patient before disaster strikes. Naomi Watts and Bob Hoskins also star.

programme.title: Enough Said
programme.desc: A divorced woman who decides to pursue the man she's interested in learns he's her new friend's ex-husband.

programme.title: Destination Wedding
programme.desc: The story of two miserable and unpleasant wedding guests, Lindsay and Frank, who develop a mutual affection despite themselves.

programme.title: Lincoln
programme.desc: As both sides tire of the ongoing American Civil War, United States President Abraham Lincoln fights on in a bid to change the constitution and end slavery forever. However, with the nation in turmoil and with many thousands of soldiers having already lost their lives, the outcome of the vote is far from certain, with many key members of his inner circle opposing the revolutionary change. Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Tommy Lee Jones also feature.

programme.title: Great Expectations
programme.desc: A humble orphan suddenly becomes a gentleman with the help of an unknown benefactor.

programme.title: Tuvie Austrumi ar Naidželu Sleiteru
programme.desc: Nigel Slater takes his trusted taste buds to the Middle East, exploring the divine cuisines this diverse region has to offer in a three-part documentary series. The revered food critic and cookbook writer visits a different country in each episode, celebrating their unique tastes and cooking techniques. His menu of nations is made up of Lebanon, Turkey and Iran, exploring each one to understand what makes them so different. In Lebanon he arrives at the end of Ramadan, celebrating Eid with a local family in Beirut. In Turkey he samples food fit for the Sultans, as well as everyday rural dishes. Finishing his journey in Iran, he learns about the importance of traditional food and how, despite a growing number of fast-food outlets, the country observes these age-old customs.

programme.title: Tie esam mēs
programme.desc: This heart-warming family dramedy series follows the extraordinary lives of two parents Jack and Rebecca Pearson, and their three children known as the ''Big Three'' Kevin, Kate and Randall through several different time frames. Rebecca had a difficult pregnancy with triplets, and after they lost one child, the Pearsons decide to adopt Randall who was born the same day. As years go by, we have a chance to see their incredible journeys and struggles after Jack's death- Rebecca's new marriage, Randall's story as he becomes a successful finance professional and a father of three, Kevin's life as an actor while struggling to be taken seriously and Kate's struggles with weight issues and everyday ups and downs as they show us the incredible power of love and moments of joy, triumph and heartbreak.

programme.title: Ēnu čuksti
programme.desc: Ghost Whisperer is an American supernatural TV series that follows the life of Melinda Gordon, a young woman with the ability to talk to ghosts, as she struggles to live as close to normal a life as she can. She helps earthbound spirits to cross over to the other world as their earthly representative. Whether it's guilt or some unfinished business that is keeping them from attaining eternal peace, it's up to Melinda to figure it all out.

programme.title: Čikāga liesmās
programme.desc: Stāsts par Čikāgas ugunsdzēsēju un paramdeiķu brigādi – viņu ikdienu, izsaukumiem uz notikumu vietām, bīstamo un pašaizliedzīgo darbu, kā arī savstarpējām attiecībām. Situācija saasinās, kad kādā no glābšanas operācijām bojā iet viens no ugunsdzēsējiem, un viņa kolēģi notikušajā vaino paši sevi viens otru. Tomēr viņiem nākas pārvarēt savas nesaskaņas, jo uz nelaimes gadījumu vietām jādodas kā vienotai un saskaņotai komandai.

programme.title: Čikāga liesmās
programme.desc: Stāsts par Čikāgas ugunsdzēsēju un paramdeiķu brigādi – viņu ikdienu, izsaukumiem uz notikumu vietām, bīstamo un pašaizliedzīgo darbu, kā arī savstarpējām attiecībām. Situācija saasinās, kad kādā no glābšanas operācijām bojā iet viens no ugunsdzēsējiem, un viņa kolēģi notikušajā vaino paši sevi viens otru. Tomēr viņiem nākas pārvarēt savas nesaskaņas, jo uz nelaimes gadījumu vietām jādodas kā vienotai un saskaņotai komandai.

programme.title: Kāsla metode
programme.desc: Vai zināji, ka slavenā detektīvu rakstnieka Kāsla pilnais vārds ir Ričards Edgars Aleksandrs Rodžerss Kāsls? Tieši šo vārdu tu dzirdēsi ļoti atbildīgā brīdī – kad Beketa sniegs atbildi uz Kāsla bildinājumu, ko viņš beidzot saņemsies izteikt. Ko viņa atbildēs un kā attīstīsies abu attiecības, ņemot vērā, ka Beketa saņēmusi kārdinošu darba piedāvājumu citā pilsētā? To tu uzzināsi, skatoties sestās sezonas sērijas! Savukārt savulaik iemīļotā seriāla "Doktors Hauss" cienītāji būs patīkami pārsteigti, ieraugot Beketas jauno pārinieci – kas ir neviena cita kā daktere Kadija jeb Lisa Edelšteina. Tevi gaida neparastas lietas, negaidīti notikumu pavērsieni un iespēja risināt izmeklēšanas mīklas un cilvēcisko attiecību pārpratumus.

programme.title: Kāsla metode

programme.title: Tie esam mēs
programme.desc: This heart-warming family dramedy series follows the extraordinary lives of two parents Jack and Rebecca Pearson, and their three children known as the ''Big Three'' Kevin, Kate and Randall through several different time frames. Rebecca had a difficult pregnancy with triplets, and after they lost one child, the Pearsons decide to adopt Randall who was born the same day. As years go by, we have a chance to see their incredible journeys and struggles after Jack's death- Rebecca's new marriage, Randall's story as he becomes a successful finance professional and a father of three, Kevin's life as an actor while struggling to be taken seriously and Kate's struggles with weight issues and everyday ups and downs as they show us the incredible power of love and moments of joy, triumph and heartbreak.

programme.title: Kandisa Renuāra
programme.desc: Kandisa varbūt neizskatās pēc tipiskas izmeklētājas. Viņa ir sievišķīga blondīne ar mobilo telefonu rozā vāciņos, viņai patīk augsti papēži, kostīmiņi un spilgti krāsotas lūpas. Piedevām Kandisa ir vientuļā māte, audzina četrus bērnus, un pēdējos desmit gadus nav strādājusi. Nu viņa atgriežas darbā, pie kam vadošā amatā – par slepkavību izmeklēšanas nodaļas vadītāju. Pa šiem desmit gadiem policijas darbā daudz kas ir mainījies – tehnoloģijas ir attīstījušās, izmeklēšanas metodes ir citas. Priekšniecība ne īpaši tic Kandisas spējām, un viņas padotie galīgi nav sajūsmā par tādu vadītāju. Īpaši neapmierināts un skeptisks ir kapteinis Djumā, kurš jau mēnesi ir vadījis komandu, un pats cerējis uz vietu, kuru nu ieņēmusi Kandisa. Lai arī Kandisa jau pirmajā izmeklēšanā pierāda, ka viņai piemīt īpaša intuīcija un spējas, kas palīdz pamanīt to, kas citiem paslīd garām, padotie ātri vien uzraksta iesniegumus par pārvietošanu – viņi nav gatavi strādāt Kandisas vadībā. Viegli nebūs, tomēr Kandisai nenāks ne prātā padoties. Tomēr viņas dzīve nesastāvēs tikai no darba un bērniem – tieši kaimiņos dzīvo patīkams vīrietis, uz kuru Kandisa atstās neaizmirstamu iespaidu jau pēc pirmās tikšanās reizes

programme.title: Kandisa Renuāra

programme.title: Marta cep
programme.desc: Paniņas, jogurts un skābais krējums – pārstrādāti piena produkti, kas maģiski pārtop ceptos labumos. Marta ielūgusi ciemos fermeri Paulu Lačinski, lai izzinātu, kā tie top. Tālāk sekos divas receptes – pīrāgs un jogurta kūka, kurās izmantoti šie piena produkti. Tāpat Marta izzinās paniņu kardamona pīrāga receptes noslēpumus.

programme.title: Marta cep
programme.desc: Eksotisko augļu eksperts Bairons Martins pievienojies Martai, lai dalītos pieredzē ar citronu pasauli. Marta parādīs, kā citrona garšas īpašības izmantot itāļu siera picas un citrona kafijas kūkas receptēs. Savukārt eksperts Džons Baričelli pagatavos citronu suflē tarti.

programme.title: Ēnu čuksti
programme.desc: Ghost Whisperer is an American supernatural TV series that follows the life of Melinda Gordon, a young woman with the ability to talk to ghosts, as she struggles to live as close to normal a life as she can. programme.title: Grejas anatomija
programme.desc: Meredita sarežģītā situācijā nezina, kuru atbalstīt, turklāt viņa nevēlas sāpināt nevienu no iesaistītajām pusēm. Tikmēr Megija atklāj sīkumus par savu privāto dzīvi, bet Levi nespēj izlemt vai viņa ģimenei jāuzzina par Niko.

programme.title: Grejas anatomija
programme.desc: Grejas anatomija ir drāma par intensīvo medicīnas apmācību, ko papildina jautrība, seksīgums un reizēm traģiskums to cilvēku dzīvēs, kuri drīz vien apjautīs, ka ne medicīna, ne arī attiecības var tikt dalītas melnajā un baltajā.

programme.title: 19. ugunsdzēsēju depo
programme.desc: The latest series from the executive producers of "Grey's Anatomy," "Scandal" and "How to Get Away with Murder," follows a group of heroic firefighters at Seattle Fire Station 19 – from captain to newest recruit – as they risk their liveS in the line of duty and off the clock. These brave men and women are like family, literally and figuratively, and together they put their own lives in jeopardy as first responders to save the lives of others.

Lai arī Kandisa jau pirmajā izmeklēšanā pierāda, ka viņai piemīt īpaša intuīcija un spējas, kas palīdz pamanīt to, kas citiem paslīd garām, padotie ātri vien uzraksta iesniegumus par pārvietošanu – viņi nav gatavi strādāt Kandisas vadībā. Viegli nebūs, tomēr Kandisai nenāks ne prātā padoties. Tomēr viņas dzīve nesastāvēs tikai no darba un bērniem – tieši kaimiņos dzīvo patīkams vīrietis, uz kuru Kandisa atstās neaizmirstamu iespaidu jau pēc pirmās tikšanās reizes

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Long before banks, ATMS and check-cashing services, there were pawn shops. Pawning was the leading form of consumer credit in the United States until the 1950s, and pawn shops are still helping everyday people make ends meet. Pawn Stars takes you inside the colorful world of the pawn business. At the Gold & Silver Pawn Shop on the outskirts of Las Vegas, three generations of the Harrison family--grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey--jointly run the family business, and there's clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. The three men use their sharp eyes and skills to assess the value of items from the commonplace to the truly historic, including a 16th-century samurai sword, a Super Bowl ring, a Picasso painting and a 17th-century stay of execution. It's up to them to determine what's real and what's fake, as they reveal the often surprising answer to the questions on everyone's mind, "What's the story behind it"? and "What's it worth?"

programme.title: Pawn Stars

It's up to them to determine what's real and what's fake, as they reveal the often surprising answer to the questions on everyone's mind, "What's the story behind it"? and "What's it worth?"

programme.title: Forged in Fire
programme.desc: Forged in Fire, an American competition series aired on the History Channel, challenges four new competitors to produce a knife in their own style with a small variety of metal objects to create from. The series, hosted by Wil Willis, consists of a three-round elimination contest to forge bladed weapons, with the final winner receiving $10,000 and the day's championship title. Judged by experts in weapon history and use, the last two people standing must create in their own forge a Moro Kris sword, a blade which dates back to 300BC, in just five days. Filmed in Brooklyn, New York, the set referred to as "The Forge" sets the scene for this suspenseful show with propane forges, power hammers and hydraulic presses, with medical personnel being close by to treat any injuries or other health problems. If the medical personnel suspect that the competitors are unable to continue safely, they will be disqualified. Once each competitor has created their weapon, it will be put through a series of tests including chopping/slashing/stabbing objects such as ropes, ice blocks, animal carcasses and steel car doors. Having to meet a number of criteria's, the smiths battle it out, without their swords, to become the best black-smith.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers' contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold & Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: Mountain Men
programme.desc: There is getting in touch with nature and then there are these lot. Imagine ridding yourself of the complexities of modern life and living completely off the grid, this TV documentary series highlights the lives of several individuals doing just that and shows viewers how they survive outside of society. Mountain Men covers individuals making a living by hunting and trapping from the Appalachian Mountains to the Rocky Mountains of Alaska. In times of winter, the cold and snowy conditions makes life almost impossible but these men show how to thrive and earn money in such difficult circumstances.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: Storage Wars: New York
programme.desc: The buyers head to Staten Island as Big Steve aims for quantity over quality while looking for items that he can easily sell at his flea market.

programme.title: Storage Wars: New York
programme.desc: The bidders head to Flatbush, where the girls decide it's time to play dirty. While Chris and Tad struggle to agree, Mike B shops for shabby chic.

programme.desc: The bidders travel to Harlem for the auction. Courtney and Candy buy a room which has a biker's jacket for $125 and find a fur coat worth $3,000.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: Assembly Required
programme.desc: Tim Allen and Richard Karn believe a clean driveway is a happy driveway, so they're challenging the makers to build the ultimate street sweeper. But first, they need to see who's the brightest bulb in the group.

programme.title: Tobot
programme.desc: Tobot is a South Korean animated TV series featuring transforming cars, some of which are designed after Kia Motors vehicles. Twin brothers Ryan and Kory live with their father, Dr. Franklin Char, robot technology expert, in a small town. Dr. Franklin Char has become physically handicapped after a car accident, in which his wife died. But he holds up well and decides to create robots for his sons, who will protect and support them and be their friends. Twins are going to have unforgettable adventures.

programme.title: Enchantimals: Tales From Everwilde
programme.desc: The Enchantimals are a group of friends with a strong bond to their beloved animals. Not only are the constantly by each others side but the Enchantimals and their animals share similarities in their appearance. Based on the popular brand of dolls, the Enchantimals series follows the girls as they embark on exciting adventures. Join them as they journey through Frozenwood in search of magical ice cream and as they pay a visit to Grazy Grasslands to help their friends find a cure for the hiccups. Never has there been a closer group of friends.

programme.title: The Wild Adventures of Blinky Bill
programme.desc: Australian cartoon series about a mischievous little koala called Blinky Bill and his best mate Jacko who live in the town of Greenpatch. Blinky Bill may be small but he's taken it upon himself to look after his hometown and its residents. So whether it's protecting his neighbours from a dangerous crocodile, helping a princess find her prince or defending Greenpatch against aliens, Blinky Bill is always on hand to help out. Based on the best-selling children's books by a New Zealand-born writer and illustrator, Dorothy Wall. Blinky Bill is thought of as a classic children's character in Australia and has been entertaining kids around the world for decades.

programme.title: The Wild Adventures of Blinky Bill
programme.desc: Australian cartoon series about a mischievous little koala called Blinky Bill and his best mate Jacko who live in the town of Greenpatch. Blinky Bill may be small but he's taken it upon himself to look after his hometown and its residents. Based on the best-selling children's books by a New Zealand-born writer and illustrator, Dorothy Wall. Blinky Bill is thought of as a classic children's character in Australia and has been entertaining kids around the world for decades.

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Maxwell "Max" McGrath's whole life changes after moving in with his mother in the tiny city of Copper Canyon. Meeting the typical people you usually do, new friends and bullies, there are other looking after him; super-villains. Hunting him down because of the TURBO energy he possesses, Max must join a secret organisation that his father started to defeat Trans-Human Industries from taking over the world. Nobody else knows about Max's powers and they are hidden from the public with the help of his friend Steel known as Ultra-Link to prevent his powers from going critical. Throughout the show, with the aid of N-TEK led by Max's uncle Ferrus, Max and Steel will discover the mystery of Steel's past and discover what actually happened to Max's father and uncover the dark secrets of N-TEK. This CGI-Animation television series was co-produced by Mattel Playground Production, Nerd Corps Entertainment and FremantleMedia Kids & Entertainment. Based on the Mattel action-figure sharing the same name, Max steel premiered on Disney XD in 2013.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Secrets of Hidden Spinjitsu
programme.desc: Ninjago was created by the First Master of Spinjitzu using the Four Golden Weapons. Wu and Garmadon fought, and the older brother, Garmadon, was banished to the Underworld. Peace didn't last for long, as Garmadon had sent Skeletons from the underworld to steal the four Weapons. Sensei Wu found four teenagers to train as ninja; Kai, Jay, Cole, and Zane, one of whom, Kai, had a sister, Nya, who had been captured by the Skeletons.

programme.title: Power Rangers Beast Morphers
programme.desc: This action programme is set in the future, and follows the Power Rangers, but not as we have always known them. A secret agency has combined a new substance, called "Morph-X" , with animal DNA to create the Power Rangers Morphers team. Together, these Rangers fight an evil virus, which is determined to take all of the Ranger power, stored inside the Morphin Grid. This set of heroes fiercely protect this, in a tale of adventure, excitement, and also great risk. There's no rest for these Rangers, and they are always on high alert, ready to fight evil.

programme.title: Treasure Trekkers
programme.desc: Treasure Trekkers follows the intrepid adventures of three heroic mouse-sized adventurers, who are tasked with preserving and protecting the priceless treasures of the world. Mo, Mac and Mip embark on challenging quests unearthing rare and sometimes magical artifacts, whilst learning to navigate their differences and discovering that the most precious treasures – friendship, kindness and respect – are the ones that come from within.

programme.title: Stoked
programme.desc: Captivating animated series that folllows the lives of six teenagers who all share love for surfing and spend their summer working at Surfer's Paradise Ridgemount Resort, in British Columbia. Meet Emma, Reef and Fin who join locals Broseph, Lo, and Johnny, and hope they will have the summer of their lives, working at the famous Surfer's Paradise Hotel. They will be more that surprised when they find out that their jobs are awful, as they have to deal with ugly uniforms, bad working hours, house that is in terrible shape and the manager who isn't the nicest of people. However, things are not so bad, as they get the opportunity to do the thing they love the most- surf, on their days off.

programme.title: Jessie
programme.desc: Jessie is an American comedy television series about a young girl, Jessie Prescott from Texas who moves to New York and becomes a nanny in a wealthy family. The Ross family she works for lives in a multimillion-dollar penthouse on the Upper West Side. The four kids, Emma, Luke, Ravi and Zuri are quite uncontrolled, but Jessie gets on well with them very fast and the real fun begins. Step by step Jessie makes every day of quiet and steady life of the Ross family feel like it's Christmas, as she is full of energy, jokes and enthusiasm.

programme.title: Wizards of Waverly Place
programme.desc: Wizards of Waverly Place is an American fantasy teen sitcom focusing on three Russo siblings with magical abilities. The Russo family are nothing but ordinary: their father is a former family wizard, and their mother is mortal. When the Russo siblings complete their wizard training, they have to participate in a competition to decide who will become the Family Wizard and keep magical powers forever, while the others lose their powers and become mortals.

programme.title: Lego Friends: Girls On A Mission
programme.desc: There is a mission and it is not an easy one! Heartlake City is under a lot of pressure from some very bad people who do very bad things. The LEGO Friends are five young girls who all have a really close friendship: best friends Andrea, Emma, Mia, Olivia and Stephanie have extremely kind girls who decide to dedicate all of their time into protecting the people who live in the city. Whether they are saving people from a huge fire; stopping mayhem caused by the Alvahbots or ridding the sea from a load of unwanted trash – the LEGO Friends will always have a solution and will do it without complaining! Every day, the girls are faced with a brand new challenge that is completely unexpected. Who knows what the challenge will be; how will they fix the problem? Children's animated television series.

programme.title: Lego Friends: Girls On A Mission

programme.title: Jungle Bunch
programme.desc: This CGI animation follows the story of 'The Jungle Bunch', a self-proclaimed group of disparate jungle animals who have taken it upon themselves to protect other creatures from the many threats and dangers that can lurk in the depths of the jungle. Led by warrior tiger Maurice (who is actually a penguin!), the crew are made up of Maurice's adopted son, Junior, who is learning the ropes; Miguel the strong gorilla, tarsier Gilbert, who has all the smarts; compassionate Batricia, the bat; and the inseparable toads Al and Bob. The troop represent justice and hope and are always ready for fun and adventure.

programme.title: Jungle Bunch
programme.desc: This CGI animation follows the story of 'The Jungle Bunch', a self-proclaimed group of disparate jungle animals who have taken it upon themselves to protect other creatures from the many threats and dangers that can lurk in the depths of the jungle. The troop represent justice and hope and are always ready for fun and adventure.

programme.title: Gormiti
programme.desc: CGI animated series with action and adventure. For thousands of years, the Island of Gorm has lived in peace. But the Gormiti, the residents of the island, have always known that harmony would not last forever. They knew the fearful Magor, the leader of the Volcano tribe, would one day return for revenge. The Gormiti warriors from four other tribes – Earth, Air, Sea, and Forest – must work together to defeat him and his tribe.

programme.title: Metalions
programme.desc: Meet Elon, an eight-year-old genius inventor, who one day while cleaning finds a summoning device and scooter left to him by his grandfather. When Elon gets in trouble, device summons an ancient warrior (a Metalion) named Leo who saves him and explains that he's a Infinite Warrior, an ancient race of powerful beasts devoted to help others and that he used to be his grandfather's friend. Leo, saddened that Earth's energy had been exploited by recklessness of humans, asks Elon to help him find all the Archean Stones to restore the Earth's energy. Together with other Infinite Warriors, they start searching for stones, having heroic adventures in a quest to save the world from evil Sigma Corp.

Being the first dog at a werewolf-only finishing school is tougher than Freddy ever imagined.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: Thomas and Friends presents life on Island of Sodor somewhere in Britain. There are several railways where all machines are animate creatures, they live and work there. Each of them tries to perform their job perfectly. The main character is a little blue tank engine Thomas, who travels to different places, gets to know different people and helps everybody who need it. Sometimes Thomas makes mistakes but it only teaches him not to repeat them in future. His friends are as hardworking as he is. Thomas and his team deliver mails, repair railway, take passengers wherever they need. Thomas and Friends can teach young viewers significant lessons of true value of friendship and importance of teamwork.

programme.title: My Little Pony
programme.desc: The ponies share adventures and help out other residents of Ponyville, while working out the troublesome moments in their own friendships.

programme.title: Moominvalley
programme.desc: This award-winning animation from Finland follows the adventures of our protagonist, the curious, perceptive and optimistic Moomintroll. The viewer can enjoy this coming-of-age tale as our teenage hero attempts to overcome the obstacles of growing up within his beloved family unit while still being true to his own individual character. He has a loving mother, Moominmama, and a sentimental father, Moominpapa who he lives with in harmony with their natural surroundings. He also enjoys adventures to the magical land beyond Moominvalley with his friends, the free-spirited wanderer Snufkin, the chaotic Little My, daydreamer Snorkmaiden, cowardly Sniff, and many others.

programme.title: Heidi
programme.desc: Heidi is a little girl who is full of beans. She faces many problems up in the Swiss alps whilst living with her grandfather. Heidi lights up and soothes the people and animals all around her, with her enthusiastic, generous and wonderful zest for life. This bubbly, young orphan girl will learn the priceless value of friendship and mutual respect. Follow her journey as she dicovers life's ups and downs.

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: ROBIN HERE, ROBIN THERE, ROBIN EVERYWHERE! Robin of Locksley is a carefree, brave and courageous young man who is always on help when trouble brews. With the help of his group of outlaw friends they fight back against the plots of the evil Prince John. Can they do it? With the just a bow and arrow to save the day, watch as Robin and friends take on Prince John on their wild adventures around Sherwood Forest. An animated adaptation if the Robin Hood story, created by Method Animation and DQ Entertainment.

programme.title: Andi Mack
programme.desc: On the eve of her 13th birthdday, Andi's (Peyton Elizabeth Lee) free spirited big sister, Bex, returns home from her nomadic travels around the world. Andi is delighted at the prospect of having an exciting accomplice who can help her to bend her mother's strict rules and who she can learn from. However, it is soon diisclosed that Bex is, in fact, Andi's real mother and Celia, who Andi thought was her mother, is really her grandmother. This shocking revelation forces Andi to embark on a contemplative journey of self diiscovery. She is helped by her best friends Cyrus and Buffy who are also trying to find their way in the world. This is a heart warming coming-of-age tale that touches on some adult themes in a positive manner while also being loads of fun!

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Maxwell "Max" McGrath's whole life changes after moving in with his mother in the tiny city of Copper Canyon. Meeting the typical people you usually do, new friends and bullies, there are other looking after him; super-villains. Hunting him down because of the TURBO energy he possesses, Max must join a secret organisation that his father started to defeat Trans-Human Industries from taking over the world. Nobody else knows about Max's powers and they are hidden from the public with the help of his friend Steel known as Ultra-Link to prevent his powers from going critical. Throughout the show, with the aid of N-TEK led by Max's uncle Ferrus, Max and Steel will discover the mystery of Steel's past and discover what actually happened to Max's father and uncover the dark secrets of N-TEK. This CGI-Animation television series was co-produced by Mattel Playground Production, Nerd Corps Entertainment and FremantleMedia Kids & Entertainment. Based on the Mattel action-figure sharing the same name, Max steel premiered on Disney XD in 2013.

programme.title: Enchantimals: Tales From Everwilde
programme.desc: The Enchantimals are a group of friends with a strong bond to their beloved animals. Not only are the constantly by each others side but the Enchantimals and their animals share similarities in their appearance. Based on the popular brand of dolls, the Enchantimals series follows the girls as they embark on exciting adventures. Join them as they journey through Frozenwood in search of magical ice cream and as they pay a visit to Grazy Grasslands to help their friends find a cure for the hiccups. Never has there been a closer group of friends.

programme.title: Kidz Megamix
programme.desc: Most wanted, most traced, most current music videos for the teenage fans.

programme.title: Tas ir Džojs
programme.desc: Tas ir Džojs! Ja uzskatāt, ka katrai problēmai ir garlaicīgs risinājums, jūs nepazīstat Džoju! Ar draugiem Olivu un Jasīnu viņš atradīs atjautīgākos un negaidītākos risinājumus, lai izkultos no nelāgām situācijām un palīdzētu citiem.

programme.title: Tas ir Džojs

programme.title: Jautrīši
programme.desc: Esiet sveicināti Jautrajā pilsētā. Tā ir miermīlīga burvju vieta, kurā dzīvo mazi cilvēciņi Jautrīši un jaukas, pūkains radības Mošķīši. Viņi dzīvo tikai pēc viena noteikuma – ne dienu bez piedzīvojuma.

programme.title: Remija un Bū
programme.desc: Unikāla mazas meitenes Remijas un lieliska robota Bū draudzība. Remija ir zinātkāra sešus gadus veca meitene ar unikālu labāko draugu – Bū, lielu, mīkstu, rozā robotu. Ar Remijas mērķtiecību un Bū prasmēm viņu dienas Delfīnbejā ir abu iztēles radītu piedzīvojumu pilnas.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ir jauka, nekaunīga cūciņa, kas dzīvo ar savu mazo brāli Džordžu, kā arī sivēnu mammu un tēti. Pepas mīļākās nodarbes ir spēļu spēlēšana, pucēšanās, laiskošanās un rotaļāšanās dubļainās peļķēs. Viņas piedzīvojumi allaž beidzas laimīgi, skaļi un rukšķīgi skanot smiekliem.

programme.title: Mans mazais ponijs: draudzība ir brīnums
programme.desc: Saņemot brīdinājumu par šausmīgu pareģojumu, Princese Celestia uz Poniju zemi sūta savu studenti Sparklu. Tā viņa cer pārliecināties, ka viss tiek sagatavots kā nākas, un ka jauniete iegūs vairākus draugus.

programme.title: Mans mazais ponijs: draudzība ir brīnums
programme.desc: Saņemot brīdinājumu par šausmīgu pareģojumu, Princese Celestia uz Poniju zemi sūta savu studenti Sparklu. Tā viņa cer pārliecināties, ka viss tiek sagatavots kā nākas, un ka jauniete iegūs vairākus draugus.

programme.title: Kindi Kids
programme.desc: Animated children's series based on the toy range of the same name. Kindi Kids follows the adventures of a delightful group of colourful humans that live playfully in tribes. Each tribe is centered around a unique aspect or behaviour, such as the Shoppets, who are mischievous creatures always looking to cause destruction to their magical world, Rainbow Kindi. All of the tribes live in Rainbow Kindi, a vibrant and vivid world where the characters interact, often leading to hilarious events and situations. Young children are invited to join the colourful characters as they enjoy yet another series of amazing adventures.

programme.title: Alas klubs "Cave Club"
programme.desc: Esiet sveicināti piedzīvojumu, izpētes un pat dinozauru pasaulē. Kopā ar pieciem draugiem atklājiet negaidītu mūsdienas populārāko tendenču izcelsmi un risiniet visiem zināmas problēmas. Šie labākie draugi būs pirmie, kas visu redzēs un darīs, sākot ar pašu pirmo labāko draugu grupu "Alas klubs".

programme.title: Enchantimals: Saulainā Savanna
programme.desc: Brīnummeža draugi palīdz Saulainās Savannas iemītniekiem sagatavoties Spīguļojošajai Izrādei, paši iesaistoties vizuļojošajā jautrībā un vienlaikus gūstot svarīgas mācības. Saulainajā Savannā kopā vienmēr ir jautrāk.

programme.title: Motopilsētas maģija
programme.desc: Ar bagātīgu iztēli apveltītais Bens ar burvju otu un klasiskajiem Motauna ritmiem pārveido savu pilsētu, iedvešot dzīvību raibos ielu mākslas darbos.

programme.title: Beat Bugs
programme.desc: Ar The Beatles slaveno dziesmu palīdzību, pieci draudzīgi kukaiņi apgūst svarīgas mācības par apkārtējo pasauli, nepametot savu pagalmu.

programme.title: Muminu ieleja
programme.desc: Ziņkārīgs un ideālistisks Mumintrollis ar savu neparasto ģimeni un kaprīzajiem draugiem aizvedīs mūs piedzīvojumos Muminielejas maģiskajā pasaulē. Dažkārt viņi dosies tālāk par ieleju uz lielajiem plašumiem, milzīgajiem, tumšajiem mežiem, noslēpumainām, tālām salām un vientuļiem, bīstamiem kalniem.

programme.title: Машины сказки
programme.desc: Маша рассказывает своим игрушкам известные сказки народов мира в неповторимой детской манере — путая сюжеты и героев и завершая каждую историю неожиданным и остроумным выводом.

programme.title: Пингвин

programme.title: Тараканище
programme.desc: По сказке К. Чуковского о страшном-престрашном Тараканище, который до смерти напугал всех зверей, но был проглочен обыкновенным маленьким воробышком.

programme.title: Федя Зайцев
programme.desc: Начало нового учебного года, классы после ремонта ждут своих учеников. Федя Зайцев первым пришел в школу и нарисовал на стене человечка. Но сил признаться в этом у него не хватило, и вся вина падает на его соседа по парте. Всю ночь его мучают угрызения совести. Посмотрим, хватит ли ему сил признаться в содеянном?

programme.title: Маша и Медведь
programme.desc: Маша — невероятно активная девочка, которая никогда не сидит на месте и считает, что весь мир создан для неё одной. Машина индивидуальность не знает границ, поэтому урок труда легко оборачивается строительством парусного корабля, а набор художника — в разукрашивание всего леса.

programme.title: Кот-рыболов
programme.desc: Добрый Кот пошел на рыбалку, а к нему в компанию напросились лесные звери, желающие полакомиться на дармовщину.

Ancient X Files
programme.desc: According to the Gospels, the Crown of Thorns was worn by Jesus Christ during his crucifixion, and is today one of the Catholic religion's most sacred relics. Fr. Patrick Hough, a Jesuit priest, investigates a relic said to be the real Crown, protected in Paris at the Cathedral of Notre Dame. He explores a thorn from the Crown that appears to miraculously bleed. And the construction of a crown using thorns found around Jerusalem may shed new light on Christ's crucifixion. Also in this episode, a series of mummies, over 600 years old, have been found in remote part of the mountainous regions of Peru.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: En route to Boise, Idaho, Continental Airlines Flight 1713 is delayed on the tarmac in Denver where controllers struggle to keep departures on schedule amid heavy snow. When the plane is finally cleared for take-off, the DC-9 barely lifts off the ground before its banks sharply and crashes. Investigators find nothing wrong with the aircraft itself, but what they eventually uncover changes commercial flight forever.

programme.title: Hard Time
programme.desc: Las Vegas can be full of vices-both legal and illegal. Break the law and you're hauled into the Clark County Detention Center, a sobering jail in the middle of the glitz and glam of the strip. But getting booked here punishes more than arrestees-family and friends on the outside often share the heartache of the jail sentence. Loved ones must navigate an intimidating world where details of what's happening behind bars are hard to find and visitation lasts only 30 minutes a day. It's this stress that can drive some families closer…and others apart.

programme.title: Primal Survivor
programme.desc: Join survival and wilderness expert Hazen Audel as he pushes his skills to the limit in a series of challenging adventures around the globe. This documentary series tracks Hazen's exploits following the road less travelled where the terrain and elements can prove to be harsh and unstable. Along the way, he visits local communities and quizzes the native residents about the surrounding territory to help him on his arduous journey. Episodes feature such rigorous expeditions as following in the footsteps of the Embera tribe of Panama and Colombia to trek through the jungle of the Darien Gap; navigating the Arctic Circle accompanied by 200 reindeer; and traversing lakes infested with crocodiles.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: What would we find if we pulled the plug on our seas and oceans? This remarkable documentary series from the National Geographic Channel explores unseen seabeds to uncover the mysteries behind sunken vessels and long-lost ships. Using computer generated maps of the ocean floor, the team of scientists probe these unknown waters hoping to find some of history's missing ships and treasures. From lost cities to pirate ships, military vessels to relics from a different time, the team hope to understand more about how these legends were lost to the deep, dark depths.

programme.title: Food Factory
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered just what it takes to get the food you eat on to your plate? This fascinating series takes the viewer behind the scenes of the food production mega-industry to reveal how each product is sourced, processed, packaged, transported, and sold to the consumer. From raw material to finished product, this show reveals the ingenuous techniques and intriguing methods that go into feeding the nation. Among the extensive food products covered, episodes include how Campbell's condensed soup, Canadian whiskey, granola bars, blue cheese, rice cakes, Razzles, and brioche all get mass produced for the hungry public!

programme.title: Food Factory
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered just what it takes to get the food you eat on to your plate? This fascinating series takes the viewer behind the scenes of the food production mega-industry to reveal how each product is sourced, processed, packaged, transported, and sold to the consumer. programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: The Science of Stupid is a whacky British science show that looks at some of the most watched videos on the internet and explains the science behind them. Initially hosted by Top Gear's Richard Hammond, and later by Dallas Campbell, this National Geographic is a comedic gem. With the first series airing episodes titled Cannon Ball Ice Dude, Learning to Fly, Jet Pack Failure and Dancing Disaster, you can guarantee that this is one of the most ridiculous shows on television. What more could you want?

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: The show that combines cold hard science with some of the craziest, most spectacular and painful user generated clips ever recorded is back for a third season. Richard Hammond introduces a host of new mishaps featuring brave, if misguided individuals from around the world and then explains the science behind their failure and humiliation with the use of bespoke animations and super slo-mo cinematography. In this episode we learn just how many ways there are to embarrass, injure and humiliate yourself when paragliding, riding dirt-bikes and being subjected to a wedgie.

programme.title: Strippers: Cars for Cash
programme.desc: Two teams compete to see who can make the most money by buying, breaking and selling parts from scrap cars. This week the teams are given a mere £250 to buy their vehicle of choice. Unabashed by previous failures in the 4x4 scene, Frankie crowbars Ben into going for a Suzuki Samurai. George and Sheldon settle on a Fiat Seicento, with an Abarth body kit but unfortunately a non-running engine. Two bargain basement bangers, two teams of die-hard scrappers with three days to dismantle and flog parts. The only question left unanswered is which two can turn the most profit in this cheap and cheerful challenge.

programme.title: Supercar Megabuild
programme.desc: On this episode of Supercar MegaBuild, Jodie Kidd has an unusual request. She wants mechanics Shane and Dan to convert a family saloon Maserati Ghibli into something capable of going 200 miles an hour! That's a big ask since its original top speed is just 150. In addition, Jodie also wants it to have a retro restyle to embrace the appearance of the legendary Maserati Tepo from the 1960s. With a supercar for a supermodel, the pressure is on!

programme.title: King Fishers
programme.desc: In this humorous action packed international adventure we pitch three fishermen, from three different countries against each other to discover who is the KINGFISHER. In this episode, all-Canadian Kevin, a jet-boating, hockey-pro from British Columbia takes on Pepper, a laid back American who lives in the Amazon and Sean, an ultra-competitive fishing guide from the south coast of England. In Canada they fish for the mighty, prehistoric sturgeon, in the Amazon they hunt the peacock bass, one of sport fishings most ferocious fighters and on the south coast of England they cast their rods for every salt-water species available. But this competition isnt just about who catches the most and who catches the biggest, its also about who hosts the ultimate fishing trip. Will a fishing lodge experience on the banks of the Fraser River in Canada outscore the party atmosphere of the Brazilian Amazon and how will they fare against the warm English pubs of Dorset? The fishermen award each other extra marks for the overall experience they provide on their home territory, these points are added to their fishing scores and ultimately, one is crowned, King Fisher. Its a hard fought battle throughout, and the story keeps us guessing right until the end.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Petrol head Tony's Jaguar Mk2 has been in his family for over 40 years. Due to complications following a stomach operations he's not been able to restore the car himself and it's sat neglected in the garage for nearly two decades. With Fuzz battling to start the Jags engine and Tim having to get his hand dirty making parts it will be a race against time to get this British classic finished on time.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna
programme.desc: After a week of not catching, Pinwheels captain Tyler McLaughlin struggles to get back to the top of the leaderboard. The competition shakes up when a new boat, The Whistler, fishes to help Tyler out of his slump. Determined to win, Captain Dave Carraro goes after a strong lead ahead of Pinwheel while Tylers not catching. Meanwhile, Hot Tuna fights to stay in the top three, and Wicked Pissah discovers new motivation to move up the leaderboard.

programme.title: Primal Survivor
programme.desc: Join survival and wilderness expert Hazen Audel as he pushes his skills to the limit in a series of challenging adventures around the globe. This documentary series tracks Hazen's exploits following the road less travelled where the terrain and elements can prove to be harsh and unstable. Along the way, he visits local communities and quizzes the native residents about the surrounding territory to help him on his arduous journey. Episodes feature such rigorous expeditions as following in the footsteps of the Embera tribe of Panama and Colombia to trek through the jungle of the Darien Gap; navigating the Arctic Circle accompanied by 200 reindeer; and traversing lakes infested with crocodiles.

programme.title: Cosmos: Possible Worlds
programme.desc: The human understanding of the universe is very limited but there is one man who believes that our future is greater than anyone thought possible. Neil deGrasse Tyson explores how we could look at space and space travel in the near and distant future, discussing our discovery of the laws of nature and how to find our exact coordinates in the universe. From our own planet we will take a journey through our solar system, galaxy and beyond to seek answers as to whether human habitation is possible on other planets and if there is, possibly, intelligent alien life already out there. The Cosmos is vast and holds endless answers yet even more questions. Asking those questions is only the beginning. Documentary series.

programme.title: Banged Up Abroad
programme.desc: Champion skier Nick Brewer flees home and begins selling pills in the South of France. As he works his way up the ranks of a dark Mediterranean underworld, he's posted to Argentina for the job of his life. When it all goes wrong, he and his partner hatch an ingenious plan to smuggle 330 kilos of cocaine to Europe. It isn't long before they become kingpins of a multi-million dollar cocaine empire. But it soon comes crumbling down around them.

programme.title: Airport Security: Brazil
programme.desc: Federal Police at Sao Paolo International Airport work 24-7 to stop illegal activity. Their main threat, cocaine smuggling. Agents arrest two different traffickers with bricks of cocaine branded in the same curious way. One of those loads is among the largest of the last few years. Panicked asylum seekers refuse to cooperate, causing an uproar. And suitcases carrying hundreds of counterfeit goods are intercepted.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Flying just a few hundred feet above the desert, six single-engine WW2 fighter planes get into position for the highlight event of the Reno Air Races. And with 30,000 spectators watching from below, they fly an eight-mile oval at close to 450 miles per hour. Competing in a highly-modified P-51 Mustang called 'The Galloping Ghost', local legend Jimmy Leeward is determined to set a new speed record. But half-way through the race, his plane suddenly pitches up, spirals out of control, and crashes onto the tarmac in front of the stands. It's one of the worst air race crashes of all time, and investigators call on the pilot's close friend to help them piece together what went wrong.

programme.title: Primal Survivor
programme.desc: Join survival and wilderness expert Hazen Audel as he pushes his skills to the limit in a series of challenging adventures around the globe. This documentary series tracks Hazen's exploits following the road less travelled where the terrain and elements can prove to be harsh and unstable. Along the way, he visits local communities and quizzes the native residents about the surrounding territory to help him on his arduous journey. Episodes feature such rigorous expeditions as following in the footsteps of the Embera tribe of Panama and Colombia to trek through the jungle of the Darien Gap; navigating the Arctic Circle accompanied by 200 reindeer; and traversing lakes infested with crocodiles.

programme.title: Europe from Above
programme.desc: A fascinating documentary series from National Geographic exploring Europe from above. Although only the second-smallest continent on our planet, Europe is packed full of diverse wildlife, cities, countries, politics and history. From this unique perspective, viewers can see the culturally rich continent like they never have before, with cameras in the sky offering a stunning examination of these beautiful lands. Each episode in this six-part series focusses on a respective country, with those explored in this series being the Netherlands, Italy, Germany, Spain, the United Kingdom and Poland. Narrated by Julian Barratt.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls
programme.desc: Actress, supermodel, and social media influencer Cara Delevingne realizes a long-held dream of accompanying Bear Grylls on an adventure. Sweeping Cara off her scooter and onto a helicopter, the two ascend into the mountains of Sardinia. At nearly a mile high in elevation, Bear shows Cara how to brave several heart-stopping obstacles including pulling herself across a horizontal line suspended 200 feet in the air and a dangerous waterfall rappel.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: With airplane travel becoming increasingly popular in a shrinking world and millions of passengers journeying this way every day, it is helpful to be aware of the potentail dangers involved. This show presents remarkable stories of some of the most catastrophic accidents in aviation history and investigates the causes of the accidents, what effect they had on the industry and the steps taken to ensure that they don't happen in the future. Each stand-alone episode features compelling re-enactments, expert analysis and interviews with those involved. The explanations for the accidents range from the explosive power of decompression to problems with autopilots and computerised control systems to air traffic control errors.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: With airplane travel becoming increasingly popular in a shrinking world and millions of passengers journeying this way every day, it is helpful to be aware of the potentail dangers involved. This show presents remarkable stories of some of the most catastrophic accidents in aviation history and investigates the causes of the accidents, what effect they had on the industry and the steps taken to ensure that they don't happen in the future. Each stand-alone episode features compelling re-enactments, expert analysis and interviews with those involved. The explanations for the accidents range from the explosive power of decompression to problems with autopilots and computerised control systems to air traffic control errors.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim Shaw, a car enthusiast and TV presenter teams up with master mechanic Fuzz Townshend to rescue rusty old cars and classic vehicles from their former neglected lives. People can nominate a relative or friend without them knowing if they've been unable to restore the car themselves for any reason from medical issues to financial problems. A team of experts work hard to restore the vehicles to their former glory and once they have been revamped the owner is surprised with a reunion, usually at a staged event organised by Tim Shaw.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.

People can nominate a relative or friend without them knowing if they've been unable to restore the car themselves for any reason from medical issues to financial problems. A team of experts work hard to restore the vehicles to their former glory and once they have been revamped the owner is surprised with a reunion, usually at a staged event organised by Tim Shaw.

programme.title: Strippers: Cars for Cash
programme.desc: Strippers: Cars for Cash is a reality TV series revolving around two teams of car dismantlers competing against each other to find cars to buy, then break and sell the parts. The main aim is to make profit, so some outstanding selling skills and tactics are needed. All kinds of old rusty cars can be useful to their owners even if they are undriveable. Teams must play their cards right and just in three days find, dismantle and sell the part, the best wins the challenge.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz are drafted in to totally rebuild a beloved Jeep and repair an old mans heart after both were callously broken in an arson attack. The 4 wheel drive war horse was so frazzled by the fire that a huge amount of new parts have to be sourced but Tim valiantly campaigns to keep the history in the Jeeps scarred panels intact. Its a constant battle and the boys are put under more pressure when they find out that Dick, the Jeeps owner, is very, very fussy about all the details being just right. In an epic final scene that Spielberg would have been proud of the Jeep throws one last spanner in the work. When Dick finally sees his car he cant believe his eyes, but have the boys scored a bullseye or shot themselves in the foot?

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: In this action-packed adventure comedy series we follow children of the Hunter family-Tess, Anika, Sal, Daniel and Max, the newest member of the family as they search for their missing foster parents through all Amsterdam. At the same time they must run from the people that mean them harm and solve the family mystery to uncover the special treasure and get their parents back and in the process they learn a lot about love and family.

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: In this action-packed adventure comedy series we follow children of the Hunter family-Tess, Anika, Sal, Daniel and Max, the newest member of the family as they search for their missing foster parents through all Amsterdam. At the same time they must run from the people that mean them harm and solve the family mystery to uncover the special treasure and get their parents back and in the process they learn a lot about love and family.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: School of Rock is an American musical-comedy television series based on the 2003 film of the same name. A group of teenagers of the prestigious american school have a pretty predictable life, until one day totally changes everything. Once they get a substitute teacher Dewey Finn and he instructs Tomika, Freddy, Summer, Zack and Lawrence in the art of rock and roll. Mr Finn has his own view on the lesson structure and he gets across to the students easily so they become his huge fans at once. Thanks to Mr Finn the teens create a rock band and learn to play different instruments. Rock helps them to realize that in order to become successful they must learn how to work as a team, merge into one and leave any signs of egoistic behavior behind.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: When Tomika tries too hard to be like her favorite artist, she unintentionally hurts her friends and learns it's better to be yourself. Meanwhile, Dewey tries to prove his music cred by claiming to know a music legend.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Babe and Kenzie are two, 12-year-old girls who create a mobile game that becomes the most popular game of the year. With the profits and their friend, Hudson, world – famous Rapper Double G, and his son, Triple G, the girls start their own supercool gaming company in Brooklyn. Now, Babe and Kenzie must keep their gaming business a success while still managing to get good grades. The show experience spans multiple platforms as viewers not only watch the gang's adventures, but play their latest creations on Nick.com, the Nick App and their mobile devices.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest adventures.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea spong Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells about the ten year old boy Timmy that lives in the fictional town Dimmsdale where he has a hard time. His life is constantly miserable because his parents are rarely home, he is babysat by Vicky, a 16-year-old torturous babysitter, he is bullied daily, and is tormented by his teacher, Mr. Crocker. But everything changes when he receives two fairy godparents: Cosmo, his wife Wanda, and later their son, Poof. Timmy learns that his fairy godparents are capable of granting him any wish he wants within certain limits. However, Timmy's immature nature causes him to sometimes ask for wishes that unintentionally result in disaster.
